error.signature: TS2786: 'Component' cannot be used as a JSX component. Its return type 'ReactNode' is not a valid JSX element.
error.regex: TS2786.*cannot be used as a JSX component|not a valid JSX element

verdict.summary: Component return type does not match JSX.Element. Usually caused by mismatched @types/react versions between packages.

dead_ends.action: Cast the component to any before using in JSX
dead_ends.why_fails: Hides the real type mismatch and loses all prop type checking for the component

workarounds.action: Ensure all packages use the same @types/react version
Explicitly type component return as JSX.Element | null

leads_to.condition: When JSX type fixes reveal prop type mismatches

frequently_confused_with.distinction: TS2769 is about prop overload matching; TS2786 is about the component itself not being a valid JSX element type
